Class Game.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.main.Game.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Game

    public static class Game.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    the thing to create game object, please read the docs of every method

    *must contain args : output, render, update
